meanings.definition: The part of a record player that holds the cartridge and stylus.
meanings.sent1: The tonearms gently placed the needle on the vinyl.
meanings.sent2: The DJ adjusted the tonearms before starting the music.
meanings.sent3: The tonearms decided to take a break and relax on the turntable.
meanings.sent4: The tonearms danced gracefully across the record, creating music.
meanings.sent5: The shiny tonearms gleamed under the light, ready to play music.

meanings.definition: The arm of a record player that moves across the record to play music.
meanings.sent1: Carefully, the tonearms glided over the vinyl, producing sound.
meanings.sent2: The tonearms smoothly followed the grooves of the record.
meanings.sent3: Surprisingly, the tonearms decided to take a detour and explore the record.
meanings.sent4: The tonearms embraced the music as they danced across the vinyl.
meanings.sent5: With precision, the tonearms traced the music on the spinning record.
